summary: App with article management features, including article expiration (7 days) and article submission functionality.

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the article submission flow so that admins can successfully add new articles. The form on the Admin page must submit article data (title, content, category, image, author, etc.) to the backend without errors, and the newly created article must appear in the article list after submission.
